*div1 type="summary"* *p*Austin to Ayuntamiento of San Felipe, October 31, 1830. Asking it to apply to governor for appointment of a land commissioner.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p*Ilustrios *person_mentioned*Ayto*/person_mentioned*.*/p*
*p*In the month of *date_mentioned n="05-xx-1830">May last*/date_mentioned* I was informed verbally by the *person_mentioned*chief of Department at *location_mentioned*Bexar*/location_mentioned**/person_mentioned* that persons had been recommended to the *person_mentioned*Gvr of the State*/person_mentioned* for *person_mentioned*commissioner */person_mentioned*to dispatch the land business of the several *location_mentioned*Colonies of Texas*/location_mentioned*. On the *date_mentioned n="07-17-1830">17 day of July*/date_mentioned* I officially applied to the *person_mentioned*Gvr */person_mentioned*for the appointment of a *person_mentioned*Commissioner */person_mentioned*for my *location_mentioned*colony */location_mentioned*and on the *date_mentioned n="10-19-1830">19 day of this month*/date_mentioned* I again repeated the application, Not having recd, any answer to these applications, and there being a necessity that the land business of the *location_mentioned*colony */location_mentioned*should be completed I beg leave to call the attention of the *person_mentioned*Ayto*/person_mentioned*. to this subject and request that an official application be made to the *person_mentioned*Gvr*/person_mentioned* by that illustrious body representing the necessity and importance of having a *person_mentioned*com*/person_mentioned*. appointed without delay.*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*S. F. Austin*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p**date_mentioned n="10-31-1830">31 Oct. 1830*/date_mentioned**/p*
*/div1*
